title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 45.7 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 45.7 - Penalties

State Regulations

In addition to any criminal and civil penalties otherwise
provided by the laws of this State and of the United States, any person
violating any of the provisions of this Part shall be subject to the penalty
provisions of section
40
of the Agriculture and Markets Law, together with the quarantine and other
provisions of article 5 of said law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
45.7

Amended, New

York State Register February 12, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 6, eff. 2/12/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
